item.title: Blue States Love Food Stamp Funding but Refuse to Tell Washington How It’s Spent
item.description: SNAP is clearly a program ripe for abuse, and that should be a matter of public debate and disclosure.

item.title: Judge Talwani Still Bending Over Backwards for Planned Parenthood
item.description: More results-driven hackery from Planned Parenthood’s favorite judge.

item.title: Grand Jury Refuses to Reindict Letitia James
item.description: Bondi should try to persuade her headstrong boss that enough is enough.

item.title: Trump Is Right on Gas-Powered Cars
item.description: The administration’s rollback is another sign that the climate panic is receding.

item.title: Green Energy’s Problems Go Beyond Messaging
item.description: If well-funded environmentalists are losing the information war, maybe it’s time for them to look inward.
